\- Flavor Description: Natural & Cooked. Soft and somewhat Fluffy\*; Moderately Nutty, Creamy Taro Flesh married together with a Milky and Coconut Flavor. Full Bodied with a Creamy Coated Mouthfeel.

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- Not an authentic ‚ÄúUbe Yam‚Äù flavor. More akin to Taro

‚ñ∫Quick Notes 5% & 8%

\- 5% = Strong. Taro notes, a hint Sharper\* & Nutty Flavor more present on Exhale.

\- 8% = Bold. Natural Coconut Flavor Dominant‚Ä¶along with a Nutty Butter Upfront. Taro\* like flavor folds underneath. Heavier Body & Denser Mouthfeel\*
